original_text: And what I am doing I will continue to do, in order to undermine the claim of those who would like to claim that in their boasted mission they work on the same terms as we do.
korean_text: 나는 내가 해 온 그대로 앞으로도 하리니 기회를 찾는 자들이 그 자랑하는 일로 우리와 같이 인정 받으려는 그 기회를 끊으려 함이라

sentences.original_text: And what I am doing I will continue to do
in order to undermine the claim of those
that in their boasted mission they work
on the same terms as we do
